metadata.title: Phakkay Camping | Riverside Resort in Saraburi near Cha Om
metadata.description: Affordable riverside resort in Saraburi, Thailand. Nordic, Japanese & A-Frame style accommodations by the stream near Cha Om and Krok Ee Dok Waterfall. Free breakfast, stunning river views. Budget-friendly Saraburi accommodation.
metadata.keywords: Saraburi accommodation, Cha Om resort, riverside resort Saraburi, budget resort Saraburi, stream-side accommodation, Krok Ee Dok Waterfall hotel, A-frame cabin Thailand

nordic.description: Experience modern Scandinavian design with warm, cozy interiors. Our Nordic rooms feature clean lines, natural materials, and a minimalist aesthetic that creates the perfect sanctuary for relaxation.
